query:
SELECT table_name, count FROM (
  SELECT 'players' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM players WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'team_coins', COUNT(*) FROM team_coins WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'fa_transactions', COUNT(*) FROM fa_transactions WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'fa_bids', COUNT(*) FROM fa_bids WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'cap_violations', COUNT(*) FROM cap_violations WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'team_assignments', COUNT(*) FROM team_assignments WHERE team IN ('Thunder', 'Clippers')
) as counts;
